---
name: ğŸ› Bug Report
about: Booking returns after cancelling
title: Cancel booking
labels: 'bug'
assignees: 'Romio'
---

## ğŸ› Bug Description
I create a booking, when I go to cancel it, and refresh the screen or go out of the current screen and return, my booking is still present, uncancelled.

## ğŸ”„ Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to current bookings
2. Click on cancel booking
3. Click back, and click current bookings again
4. See error

## âœ… Expected Behavior
The booking should have been removed and not available in current bookings anymore.

## ğŸ–¥ï¸ Actual Behavior
Upon returning to the 'current bookings' screen after a booking has been cancelled, the booking was still present and not cancelled

## ğŸ“¸ Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

## ğŸ’» Environment
- OS: Windows 10
- Browser: Chrome 
- Version: v1.0.0

## ğŸ“ Additional Context
Add any other context about the problem here.
